modName: Lusty Argonian Maid and Sultry Argonian Bard - The Untold Story - EXPLICIT CONTENT
summary: Doesn\'t it irk you not knowing what naughty shenanigans Lifts-Her-Tail and Croon-Tail dive into after the books conveniently cut away? Look no further, and experience the books like you\'ve never before. Three books extended by at least 50+ pages each.
descriptionHtml:
[If you\'re having trouble downloading, please let me know.]




---DESCRIPTION---

Doesn\'t it irk you not knowing what naughty shenanigans Lifts-Her-Tail and Croon-Tail dive into after the books conveniently cut away? Look no further, and experience the books like you\'ve never before. Three books extended by at least 50+ pages each.

This mod patches all existing volumes of the Lusty Argonian Maid and The Sultry Argonian Bard, so if you have already found them you can get straight to reading.

Don\'t forget to endorse if you like it. It would be most appreciated. ;D

!!! This book mod contains stories of a strong explicit sexual nature involving beast races (a Argonian female named \"Lifts-Her-Tail\" and a Argonian male by the name of \'\'Croon-Tail\'\'). Discretion is advised. !!!





---INSTALLATION---

1. Go to the \'\'Files\'\' tab.

2. Click \'\'Download with Manager\'\' on which version you\'d like to download (all or either).

3. Activate it in the Nexus Mod Manager.

4. You\'re done!


[Please note that The Sultry Argonian Bard is native to the Dawnguard DLC, and therefore requires the DLC to function.]





CAN\'T- OR DON\'T WANT TO, DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL THIS MOD? BUT STILL WANT TO READ THE STORIES? Please follow this/these link(s). No registration required.


L.A.M. v1 - The Untold Story
https://www.sofurry.com/view/117147

L.A.M. v2 - The Untold Story
https://www.sofurry.com/view/468346

S.A.B. v1 - The Untold Story
https://www.sofurry.com/view/475373








---LOCATIONS (courtesy of UESPWiki)---

Quick reference:
All books can be found in Healga\'s room, inside Healga\'s Bunkhouse (Riften). They\'re stacked on top of the nightstand.



Detailed reference:

The Lusty Argonian Maid v1 locations:


No# 1
LOCATION REFERENCE TOWN: DAWNSTAR
To the northeast of Dawnstar inside \"Driftshade Refuge\", on a shelf in the room to the left, near where two silver hand enemies are.


No# 2
LOCATION REFERENCE TOWN: RIFTEN
On a table in the tunnels beneath \"Riftweald Manor\" (which is a house inside riften), next to Mercer\'s Plans.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The Lusty Argonian Maid v2 locations:

No# 1
LOCATION REFERENCE TOWN: WHITERUN
To the southeast of Whiterun inside a house named \"Honningbrew Meadery\", on a shelf, 2nd floor.


No# 2
LOCATION REFERENCE TOWN: RIFTEN
Inside Riften there is a Inn/boarding house named \"Haelga\'s Bunkhouse\", the book can be found in Haelga\'s bedroom (volume 1 can also be found here). Oooh, Healga\'s a naughty girl.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The Sultry Argonian Bard v1 locations:

No# 1
LOCATION REFERENCE TOWN: RIFTEN/FORT DAWNGUARD
Inside fort Dawnguard, find the archery. Look for a door to \'\'Dead Drop Falls\'\' and pass through it. Inside you will find a big hole in the floor with a waterfall running down it.

Jump into the hole, there is a hidden puzzle dungeon inside. Solve all the puzzles (consult Google or YouTube if you get stuck). Once you get to \'\'Dead Drop Mines\'\', keep your eyes pealed for a bit with for raised scaffolding with a bedroll on it. Next to the bedroll you will find the book.


No# 2 (custom location)
LOCATION REFERENCE TOWN: RIFTEN
I\'ve taken the liberty of adding a second Sultry Argonian Bard book inside \"Haelga\'s Bunkhouse\". It lies on top of the two Lusty Argonian Maid volumes, in Haelga\'s room.
author: BlackPuma
